statusDetails.message:
Found 2 accessibility violations:
1) <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/listitem?application=axeAPI
  a) [".navbar-text"]
    Fix any of the following:
      List item does not have a <ul>, <ol> or role="list" parent element


2) Zooming and scaling must not be disabled: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/meta-viewport?application=axeAPI
  a) ["meta[name=\"viewport\"]"]
    Fix any of the following:
      maximum-scale on <meta> tag disables zooming on mobile devices
